author: yeckang
body:
#### PR description:

* Change the directory path for the GEM Validation plots
* Make a consistent naming scheme for GEM Validation plots with PR #34782
* Use DQM plots with `modeRelval` option for release validation
* Remove the duplicate plots of the GEM Validation and DQM
* Small bugfix for plot naming

#### PR validation:
* The branch has tested with the following commands to check if it works in 2 different geometry versions.
```
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 11611.0
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 35811.0
```
* The code format has applied with `scram-build code-format`
title: GEM Validation update
